mapper.select: SELECT *, CASE STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '待审批' WHEN 1 THEN '审批通过' ELSE '拒绝' END AS status_name FROM withdrawal_examine WHERE applicant_member_id = #{applicantMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY create_time
